Name:
SS Markay
USS Suwannee
Builder: Federal Shipbuilding and Dry Dock Company, Kearny, New Jersey
Fate:
Purchased by the US Navy

Sold 30 November 1959
Scrapped in Bilbao, Spain, June 1962
Reclassified:
AVG-27, 14 February 1942

ACV-27, 20 August 1943
CVHE-27, 12 June 1955
Armament:
2 × 5 in (127 mm)/51 cal guns
8 × 40 mm anti-aircraft guns (4×2)
12 × 20 mm anti-aircraft cannons (12×1)
